properties.property: select t1.id id ,t1.system_id nameEN ,t1.system_name nameCH ,t1.pending_type pendingType ,t1.todo_url pendingUrl from TD_WF_APP t1 where t1.id = ?

select t1.id id ,t1.system_id nameEN ,t1.system_name nameCH ,t1.pending_type pendingType ,t1.todo_url pendingUrl from
(select * from TD_WF_APP where PENDING_USED = ?) t1 right join
( select * from TD_WF_USER_SUBSCRIBE where PENDING_SUBSCRIBE = ? and user_id = ? ) t2
on t1.id = t2.app_id

select t1.id id ,t1.SYSTEM_ID nameEN , t1.SYSTEM_NAME nameCH , t1.PENDING_TYPE pendingType , t1.PENDING_USED pendingUsed ,t2.PENDING_SUBSCRIBE pendingSubscribe from TD_WF_APP t1 left join ( select * from TD_WF_USER_SUBSCRIBE where user_id = ? ) t2 on t1.id = t2.app_id
select * from TD_WF_USER_SUBSCRIBE WHERE APP_ID = ? AND USER_ID =?
update TD_WF_USER_SUBSCRIBE set PENDING_SUBSCRIBE = ? WHERE APP_ID = ? AND USER_ID =?
select a.* from td_wf_app a where a.pending_used = '1'
select t1.* from ( select * from TD_WF_APP where pending_used = '1' ) t1 left join ( select * from TD_WF_USER_SUBSCRIBE where user_id = ? ) t2 on t1.id = t2.app_id
